Name: Putt-Putt®: Pep's Birthday Surprise
About the game: Happy Birthday, Pep! It's Pep's birthday and Putt-Putt® wants to surprise him with his first birthday party ever! Join Putt-Putt® as he travels through Cartown, helping various residents, reaping rewards, and gathering supplies for the party. With new friends to meet and new problems to solve, kids will love helping Putt-Putt® get everything ready in time for the big surprise--a birthday cake, presents, decorations, and friends! Cartoon-style learning adventures where kids choose where the characters go. Over 20 fun locations to explore. The adventure changes each time the game is played. Kids have so much fun they don't even realize they are learning. Putt-Putt's® friendly and polite nature reinforces good social skills and manners. Encourages critical thinking, creative problem solving, and teamwork.
